item.title: Pirmas puslapis
item.description: This is the first page written in Hugo /** * Updates the record for this card in the database * * @param Flashcard $card * @param User $user * @param boolean $is_correct * @return FlashcardProgress */ public function update_card_progress( Flashcard $card, User $user, bool $is_correct ) { $progress = $this->get_card_progress( $card, $user ); if ( $is_correct ) { $progress->ncorrect += 1; } else { $progress->nwrong += 1; } $progress->is_last_wrong = !
